content: one-ball holiday keyhole scarf crochet or knit skill level beginner/easy size approx 2-1/2 wide x 36 long materials novelty eyelash yarn sample shown in austermann casca 1 ball approx 60 yds for crochet version size k/10 5 6 5 mm crochet hook for knit version pair of size us 13 9 mm knitting needles tapestry needle gauge not critical for this project stitches/terms beginning beg bind off bobble cast on co chain chain double crochet double_crochet knit k purl p remaining rem repeat repeat single_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch space space stitch st crochet version row 1 chain 9 single_crochet in second chain from hook and in each chain across turn 8 single_crochet row 2 chain 3 double_crochet in ea single_crochet across turn 8 double_crochet row 3 chain 1 single_crochet in ea double_crochet across turn 8 single_crochet repeat row 2 and 3 until scarf measures approx 6 ending with row 3 1 next row keyhole row chain 3 double_crochet in ea of next 2 single_crochet chain 2 skip 2 next single_crochet double_crochet in ea of last 3 single_crochet turn next row chain 1 single_crochet in ea of first 3 double_crochet work 2 single_crochet in chain-2 space single_crochet in ea of last 3 double_crochet turn next row chain 3 double_crochet in ea single_crochet across turn 8 double_crochet next row chain 1 single_crochet in ea double_crochet across 8 single_crochet repeat last 2 row until scarf measures approx 36 or until yarn is almost gone ending with 1 row single_crochet fasten_off shake scarf gently to release eyelashes to wear insert one end of scarf through keyhole knit version co 10 sts knit across work in garter stitch knit every row until piece measures approx 6 next row keyhole row knit across 4 sts bobble next 2 sts knit to end of row next row knit 4 co 2 over bound-off sts knit to end 10 sts next row knit across continue in garter stitch until scarf measures approx 36 or until yarn is almost gone bind off loosely shake scarf gently to release eyelashes to wear insert one end of scarf through keyhole copyright 2017 2003 kathy north www ravelry com/designers/kathy-north for personal or charity use only do not duplicate
